projects.name: Jigsaw: Tradie Marketplace
projects.description: A platform that allows tradies to buy and sell surplus materials that they have left over from jobs as well as new product
projects.contrib: Part of the backend development, creating an API for the mobile platform devs to consume. Also worked in CMS using Nuxt 3

projects.name: Loyali One: Digital Membership
projects.description: A digital membership app where users can view their loyalty cards for merchants in one place, can pre-purchase items from all merchants and pickup in store
projects.contrib: Part of the backend development, creating an API for the mobile platform devs to consume. Also worked in CMS using Nuxt 3

projects.name: Activfy: Fitness App
projects.description: An Online Personal Training App for Trainer & Clients
projects.contrib: Part of the backend development, creating an API for the mobile platform devs to consume. Also worked in CMS using Nuxt 3

projects.name: Logoji: The Logo Keyboard
projects.description: An app that gives you an easiest and most convenient way to find, suggest and connect with businesses in australia
projects.contrib: Part of the backend development, creating an API for the mobile platform devs to consume. Also worked in CMS using Nuxt 3

projects.name: CloudKart PH v1: Progressive App/Mobile
projects.description: An e-commerce web and mobile application exclusive in Cebu
projects.stack: Website: Vue 2.6 - CodeIgniter 3+; Mobile: Cordova - Vue 2.6; API - CodeIgniter 3+
projects.contrib: Part of the backend development to create API used for website and application. I also developed and deployed the v1 hybrid application using vue2 + cordova
